Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: Weight
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight

Field.name: WeightQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: TareWeight
Field.comment: Weight of the equipment

Field.name: WeightAllowance
Field.comment: Allowance made for increased weight due to such factors as snow

Field.name: Dunnage
Field.comment: Weight of material used to protect lading (even bracings, false floors, etc.)

Field.name: Volume
Field.comment: Value of volumetric measure

Field.name: VolumeUnitQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the volume unit

Field.name: OwnershipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship of equipment to carrier or ownership of equipment

Field.name: EquipmentDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode1
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: TemperatureControl
Field.comment: Free-form abbreviation of temperature range or flash-point temperature

Field.name: Position
Field.comment: Relative position of shipment in car, trailer, or container (mutually defined)

Field.name: EquipmentLength
Field.comment: Length (in feet and inches) of equipment ordered or used to transport shipment (The format is FFFII where FFF is feet and II is inches; the range for II is 00 through 11)

Field.name: TareQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of tare

Field.name: WeightUnitCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the weight unit

Field.name: EquipmentNumberCheckDigit
Field.comment: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment

Field.name: TypeOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying extent of transportation service requested

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: EquipmentType
Field.comment: Code identifying equipment type

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode2
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: CarTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying type of rail car or intermodal equipment type and its general characteristics
